column4: (some of which never really get to the console these days, thanks to syslogd)
dmesg just shows you what has been reported, its useful for seeing if/why things failed
how do i get gnomeboyadvance from the backports?
how do i add it? is it safe to add the backports to my list?
do you have backports repos in your sources.list?
will that command work on a deb file downloaded from internet to my harddrive?
yes, although it may tell you that you need to install other things first
can you paste to me your sources. list? I'd like to take a look at your backports text.
i thought if you could just paste the text in your sources.list that's got to do with the backports, it won't be too long.
